Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Facebook took down a photo posted by Melania Trump, when in fact, the photo was not posted by her and was not taken down by Facebook.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to back up the statement that Melania Trump posted the photo and Facebook took it down.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the photo was posted by Melania Trump and taken down by Facebook without providing any evidence or verification.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Facebook did not take down the photo as it did not violate any of their community standards.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider the alternative explanation that the photo was not posted by Melania Trump and therefore, Facebook had no reason to take it down.
